item.description:
All the details can be found here:

http://endurancekarting.com/events/info2013_limerock_may.asp

Â 

Key Points

  • Attire (everything is available for rental in case you don't have it):
    • Mandatory items:
      • Leather or Denim Jacket
      • Close toed shoes
      • Gloves
      • Helmet
      • Neck collar
    • Optional
      • Rib Protector
  • Race runs rain or shine
  • Stuff to get
    • Water, cash (for any small items, snacks at the race track etc), sunblock
    • Price is $450 per team. Each team can have a max of 3 people.
    • Appropriate stuff if raining
  • Payment
    • $450 per team (max 3 drivers - so 150 per head if 3 people)
    • If we don't have multiples of 3 people going its not an issue - endurance karting will take the extras and mix and match with other teams. So if we end up with 4 from our group willing to go, 3 will be in out team and one person will end up running with another 3-person team and still paying $150
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the registration trailer by the karting track inside the main race track
item.name: 1.5 hour Limerock Park Outdoor Endurance Race
